tweet: So far, KY-02 has received over $32 million in CARES Act grants, and the Commonwealth overall has received over $2.6 billion. In addition, the Trump administration has delivered over 1.2 million units of PPE to KY. Thank you @realDonaldTrump for delivering relief to Kentuckians!
